name: objectivehtml/media
description: A simple media management package for Laravel.

suggest.geocoder-php/google-maps-provider: geocoder-php/google-maps-provider is required for geolocation support.
suggest.php-http/guzzle6-adapter: php-http/guzzle6-adapter is required for geolocation support.
suggest.php-http/message: php-http/message is required for geolocation support.
suggest.php-http/curl-client: php-http/curl-client is required for geolocation support.
suggest.php-ffmpeg/php-ffmpeg: php-ffmpeg/php-ffmpeg is required for video support.
suggest.php-ffmpeg/binary-driver:dev-master: FFMpeg binary package is required for video support.
